name: Humaans
headline: The fastest way to onboard and manage employees
description:
Humaans is an HRIS system designed to help People Ops/Finance/IT teams operate collaboratively with all the best in class point solutions they want for their staff while maintaining a central record of employee data.

The goal is to automate the employee lifecycle by integrating deeply with other complementary solutions and turn complex/manual processes (e.g. onboarding, offboarding, compensation management, etc) into simple workflows.

founders.name: Giovanni Luperti, Founder
founders.description: CEO and co-founder of Humaans. Prev. Director of Product Design at Qubit.

founders.name: Karolis Narkevicius, Founder
founders.description: Building the product at Humaans using React/Node.js/Postgres/Redis/Kube/GCP.

# AI-Powered HRIS for high performing teams
Streamline HR processes, remove manual work, and gain actionable insights with the simplicity and ease of consumer software.
[Book a demo](https://humaans.io/</book-demo>)
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/d-pleo-76@1x-8a86c60123610156.png)
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/d-juro-60@1x-fc2fdb9f2d881abe.png)

The source of truth for all your people data
# Unlock the power of your company’s people data
Centralise and automate every stage of the employee lifecycle, empowering your team to make faster, more informed decisions that drive lasting impact.
Ask Humaans AI Companion
Empower your team with instant answers to queries using Humaans AI Companion. Designed with privacy in mind, it allows employees to quickly find information on policies, documents, and more. For HR admins, it streamlines the creation of documents and provides insights into workforce data – freeing up time for strategic initiatives.
[Discover Humaans AI](https://humaans.io/</ai>)
Bonus calculation policy conversation
Company policies conversation
Hi! How's everything going?
Everything is going well on my end! What about you? How's your day going so far?
What are our company’s values?
Our company has 9 behaviours and skills we value. They are, Judgement, Communication, Impact, Curiosity, Innovation, Courage, Passion, Honesty and Selflessness.
Show sources 
Process automation
Automate onboarding, offboarding, compensation reviews, performance management and everything in between.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/automation-800@1x-cdf95ed9e2720b7d.png)
Insights & Reporting
Real-time access to turnover data, headcount changes, salary spend, absence, tenure, and much more.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/sick-leave-card-800@1x-332d413f4d840d65.png)
User experience
Provide a consumer-grade user experience that your team will love. Humaans combines powerful HR capabilities with an intuitive interface, making it easy for anyone to navigate.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/mobile-view-1600@1x-9b5d704c1bf226b8.png)
Dynamic Databases
Tailor Humaans to fit your company’s structure. Create and adapt data sets to ensure a smooth integration to power your people operations.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/dynamic-databases-1200@1x-23c8d8ab928eab31.png)
Team collaboration
Drive efficiency and boost your team's productivity with workflows designed to facilitate seamless collaboration.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/team-collaboration-1000@1x-6a3a279cc3075aa7.png)
Real-time data views
Effortlessly update and manage large volumes of employee data without speadsheets. Save time and reduce errors by making changes across multiple records in a central view collaboratively, ensuring your HR data remains accurate and up-to-date.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/comp-table-1400@1x-8617834174ed1deb.png)
Trusted by industry leaders
# Supporting growing companies and global category leaders
Humaans powers HR data management for globally distributed companies, adapting effortlessly to their diverse needs across every region.

Fully connected
# Connect Humaans with your company’s tech stack
Seamlessly integrate Humaans with your existing tech stack through our robust API, webhooks and pre-built integrations, enabling smooth data flow and automated workflows that enhance operational efficiency.
[Browse integrations](https://humaans.io/</integrations>)
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/background-graph-5207@1x-ecee6bef9df25615.png)
Scale with Humaans
# Built to grow with you
Humaans is designed to empower growing organisations to easily manage their data at scale with a secure and reliable platform. Get up and running smoothly with specialised support and custom configurations. Advanced admin controls and security features keep your data safe.
Enterprise-Level Security and Compliance
GDPR compliant, SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001:2022 certified platform.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/compliance-800@1x-f9e1a51fa202d0d3.png)
Dedicated Support and Implementation Services
Category leading helpful support, dedicated Customer Success Manager, technical set up help and on-going product value unlock.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/support-800@1x-1d968bdb05fb26ed.png)
Data Access & Permissions
Take full control of your data with precise permission settings for all data, documents and roles, and confidently track every change with our audit logs.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/permissions-800@1x-1e85e70e539ac8b1.png)
# Migration made easy
Transition to Humaans from any providers with confidence. Our specialized implementation teams manage the entire process, ensuring a smooth, hassle-free migration so you can stay focused on your company’s success.
Tailored implementation
We work with you to create the perfect plan to implement and start unlocking value from Humaans quickly.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/implementation-375@1x-c5c86c0ff443bbb6.png)
Fully managed data migration
Our Product Implementation team handles the data migration heavy lifting for a seamless transition.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/data-migration-375@1x-e34768e8943f3327.png)
With you every step of the way
Building strong relationships matters to us, so you can count on our support whenever you need it.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/support-two-375@1x-05a3259016197761.png)
# Your data is safe with us
Protecting your company's sensitive data and ensuring operational security are our top priorities. Our enterprise-grade platform is fully certified, continuously monitored, and rigorously tested.
[Visit trust centre](https://humaans.io/<https:/trust.humaans.io/>)[Our commitment to security →](https://humaans.io/</security>)
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/compliance-logos-430@1x-833fd155b2803213.png)
Thought Leadership

# Built to grow with you
Humaans is designed to empower growing organisations to easily manage their data at scale with a secure and reliable platform. Get up and running smoothly with specialised support and custom configurations. Advanced admin controls and security features keep your data safe.
Enterprise-Level Security and Compliance
GDPR compliant, SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001:2022 certified platform.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/compliance-800@1x-f9e1a51fa202d0d3.png)
Dedicated Support and Implementation Services
Category leading helpful support, dedicated Customer Success Manager, technical set up help and on-going product value unlock.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/support-800@1x-1d968bdb05fb26ed.png)
Data Access & Permissions
Take full control of your data with precise permission settings for all data, documents and roles, and confidently track every change with our audit logs.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/permissions-800@1x-1e85e70e539ac8b1.png)
# Migration made easy
Transition to Humaans from any providers with confidence. Our specialized implementation teams manage the entire process, ensuring a smooth, hassle-free migration so you can stay focused on your company’s success.
Tailored implementation
We work with you to create the perfect plan to implement and start unlocking value from Humaans quickly.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/implementation-375@1x-c5c86c0ff443bbb6.png)
Fully managed data migration
Our Product Implementation team handles the data migration heavy lifting for a seamless transition.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/data-migration-375@1x-e34768e8943f3327.png)
With you every step of the way
Building strong relationships matters to us, so you can count on our support whenever you need it.
![](https://humaans.io/_next/static/images/support-two-375@1x-05a3259016197761.png)
# Your data is safe with us
Protecting your company's sensitive data and ensuring operational security are our top priorities. Our enterprise-grade platform is fully certified, continuously monitored, and rigorously tested.

generated_description:
**Humaans: Streamlining Employee Management**  

Founded in 2020 and hailing from London, Humaans is a modern HRIS designed to revolutionize how companies onboard and manage their employees. It aims to be the fastest way to navigate the employee lifecycle, integrating with best-in-class solutions while keeping all employee data organized in one central hub.

**What They Do**  
Humaans automates complex HR processes like onboarding, offboarding, and performance management, transforming them into simple, user-friendly workflows. The platform is built to support People Ops, Finance, and IT teams by providing an intuitive interface that allows for easy collaboration across departments. 

Their features include:
- **Core HR Management**: A comprehensive employee database, workflow automation, performance reviews, absence management across 300+ locations, timesheets, and powerful integrations with external applications.
- **Data & Analytics**: Insights on diversity, real-time reporting, headcount planning, and compensation management that allow HR teams to make data-driven decisions effortlessly.
- **AI Capabilities**: The Humaans AI Companion helps teams manage documents, extract insights, and streamline HR processes while prioritizing privacy.

This platform's user experience is likened to consumer software, focusing on eliminating manual work and making HR functions accessible. The result? Companies reporting up to 75% less admin work and 55% faster onboarding time, with an impressive 99.3% satisfaction rate.

**Growth and Recognition**  
Humaans is part of the Y Combinator Batch W21 and has attracted a dynamic team of 32 people. With Harj Taggar as a group partner, the company is well-positioned to grow alongside its clients, reinforcing its commitment to security with GDPR compliance and other standards.

**Looking Ahead**  
For businesses ready to scale, Humaans offers unparalleled support in integrating their HR processes within existing tech stacks through an array of integrations and dedicated customer service. As they continue to expand, their focus remains on becoming the go-to solution for employee management in a world that increasingly values agility and efficiency.

To learn more about what Humaans offers, check out their [website](https://humaans.io).
